I wish we had more regular classes, when it was possible. Combining real classes and online classes is too hard sometimes. But generally, I am satisfied with the class for 100%.

Professor Deasy guided us through the topics in such an interesting way and the discussions and interactions in class were amazing. The professor is kind, enthusiastic and encouraging. I learnt a lot in this class !

Assigments are a bit too much. I spent more than 4 hours for each essay every week including reading materials. However, everything is great, the class is very motivate and enlighten me to learn more about SEA.
